title: In this new era, with new artists everyday and new tendencies, what is considered new good music? - Quora

response.answer_text: The only way to really answer this is listen to what comes out and just decide what you yourself like. Your taste is just as valid as anyone elses. Ultimately the cream will rise to the top and what ends up being considered good will have legs…that is will still be with us years down the line. It's to easy for musicians to try to say what is good music or not but even that is just based on their particular taste…. Some of them will decide based on the musics technique and/or technicality which is fine but that's not the end all be all of good music. What's good is what people like and sticks with us for more than a minute. If we musicians really knew the answers to this question we'd all be writing all hits all the time…… and we don't.
